questions.body:
Let's get started!
Are you single or in a relationship?
Press 1 for Single; Press 2 for Relationship

How interested are you in being a surrogate?
Press 1, 2, or 3 -- 1) Kind of interested, 2) Very interested, 3) Sign me up right away!

Have you been pregnant before?
Press 1 for Yes; Press 2 for No

How many times have you given birth?
Please enter the number of pregancies

Are you a legal US resident?
Press 1 for Yes; Press 2 for No

Do you smoke?
Press 1 for Yes; Press 2 for No

Do you drink alcohol frequently?
Press 1 for Yes; Press 2 for No

Do you use illegal drugs?
Press 1 for Yes; Press 2 for No

Have you ever been convicted of a crime?
Press 1 for Yes; Press 2 for No

Almost finished, just need you to confirm some quick personal details!
Please type your full name

How tall are you?
Please use this format in your answer --> 5'9"
How many pounds do you weigh?

All finished!
One of our coordinators will be evaluating your information and you should be receiving a response from us within 24 hours.
Have a great day!
